title: Science in a wine glass
creator_credit: Kingcroft Productions, John Kingsford-Smith and Jack Gardiner
brief_description: Shows in detail, through specially made glass tanks, how wine is fermented, how fermentation is arrested, how color is infused into the red wine from skin pigmentation, how champagne is made and how wine matures. Also demonstrates how cross-pollination is effected to produce new varieties of grapes.
